name: Man-at-Arms
description: An infantryman, you fought in battle on the front lines.

exploits.name: Equipped
exploits.description: You start play with a high quality sword, spear, or suit of chainmail.

exploits.name: Hold the line
exploits.description: When standing adjacent to an ally, you both gain a 1d6 cover bonus.

exploits.name: Advance!
exploits.description: Proficient at charging across poor terrain or mud, you ignore terrain when charging.

exploits.name: Shield-bearer
exploits.description: Any shield you wear increases its DEFENSE bonus by +4.

exploits.name: Shield wall
exploits.description: When standing between two allies, all three gain a +2d6 cover bonus. This does not stack with itself or with Hold the Line.
